For first time users, the default password for this app is: password. You may change this in the settings menu. Password Error

Confirm New Password Confirm New Password If you wish to change your password, you can do so here. Simply enter your new password below, and confirm it. Your passwords do not match
If you wish to delete all current meal entries, push the, Delete All Entries, button. Warning, this action is irreversible. Delete All Entries
Confirm Meal
Confirm Changes
Edit Delete
Meal Record is an app designed to help keep track of meals, both their content, their creators, and when they are had. This is meant to help those looking to regulate their consumption, as well as for future reference for personal or medical reasons. The app is not strict, so you may track as many things as you want. When creating Meals to track, you will be asked to imput the following information. The most important part of entering meals is the Name/Date entry. -The Name/Date field is where a name for the meal and a date are stored. Listing a date and a name are important so that you and the app can keep track of your meals accurately. Naming with dates will help keep meals named uniquely, a requirement for creating new meals.string> -The Preparer field is where you can denote who made the meal. A person or an establishment are acceptable answers. This information is recommended, as an aid in case of foodborne illness, but is not required. -The Calories field is where you can store calorie information about a meal if you wish. This information is not required to use the app. -The Description field is where you can store any additional notes about a meal that you would like to keep for later. This information is not required.
